author: Special Correspondent
text: A 25-year-old realtor was killed in an accident after his two-wheeler collided with a car near Marathahalli Market near Varthur Main Road on Sunday. The deceased has been identified as V.J. Naveen, a resident of Vibhutipura. The accident took place around 2.30 a.m. when Naveen was returning home after meeting his friends. Naveen fell down and suffered serious head injuries. The driver of the car shifted him to a hospital and fled. .
title: Man killed in road accident
